dict.acceptation: 浓的，茂密的；厚的，粗大的；稠密的；不透明的；
密集地；不清晰地；〈口〉太过分；频频地，时常；
最厚的部分；最活跃或最激烈的部分；〈口〉笨蛋；〈俚〉可可粉；

sent.trans: 我把sick 误听为thick 了。

sent.orig: Using electric mixer, beat eggs and sugar in bowl until thick, about 4 minutes.
sent.trans: 用电动打蛋器，将鸡蛋和糖在大碗中打至thick,大约4分钟。

sent.orig: He has a thick beard as well as thick hair.
sent.trans: 他有一个厚实的胡子并且厚实的头发。

sent.orig: Teachers, our sincere best wishes, like the green tree, thick thick, and years of increased!
sent.trans: 老师，我们诚挚的祝福，就像老树上的翠绿，浓浓密密，与岁月俱增！

sent.orig: Fierce winds on the island fog thick cream thick snow, there are many unique natural landscape.
sent.trans: 岛上风猛雾大，霜浓雪厚，有许多独特的自然景观。
